query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS opportunities (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  leadId INT NOT NULL,
  simulationId INT NOT NULL,
  ownerUserId INT NULL,
  status ENUM('novo', 'em_analise', 'aguardando_cliente', 'em_oferta', 'ganho', 'perdido') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'novo',
  reasonLost VARCHAR(255) NULL,
  stage ENUM('lead_inicial', 'lead_qualificado', 'proposta_em_construcao', 'proposta_enviada', 'negociacao', 'fechado') NULL,
  ticketEstimado INT NOT NULL,
  probabilidade INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  nextAction VARCHAR(255) NULL,
  nextActionAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX owner_status_idx (ownerUserId, status),
  INDEX lead_idx (leadId),
  INDEX simulation_idx (simulationId)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2jqMZP8uptaqoP6.root --database neJFcwibfa3kRchdhTVVes --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS opportunities (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  leadId INT NOT NULL,
  simulationId INT NOT NULL,
  ownerUserId INT NULL,
  status ENUM('novo', 'em_analise', 'aguardando_cliente', 'em_oferta', 'ganho', 'perdido') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'novo',
  reasonLost VARCHAR(255) NULL,
  stage ENUM('lead_inicial', 'lead_qualificado', 'proposta_em_construcao', 'proposta_enviada', 'negociacao', 'fechado') NULL,
  ticketEstimado INT NOT NULL,
  probabilidade INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  nextAction VARCHAR(255) NULL,
  nextActionAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX owner_status_idx (ownerUserId, status),
  INDEX lead_idx (leadId),
  INDEX simulation_idx (simulationId)
)
